enable_internal_invoicing_help: Turn on internal invoice features and UI.
internal_invoice_require_signature_help: Department contact must upload a signed document to approve.
include_internal_in_reports_help: Include internal invoices in standard financial reports.
select_an_internal_client_and_contact_to: Select an internal client and a contact to proceed.
at_least_one_contact_is_required_for_int: At least one contact is required for internal invoices.
